A homepage displaying an overview of house cleaning services with azure mist background and dark slate blue components
A service browsing page listing all available cleaning services with detailed descriptions
A service inquiry form allowing users to ask questions about specific cleaning services
A booking system enabling users to schedule cleaning services by selecting date, time, and service type
A user dashboard for checking the status of booked cleaning services
A contact us page with phone number and email address for reaching customer service staff
Frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
Backend API server connecting to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
Database schema supporting service listings, bookings, user inquiries, and service statuses
RESTful API endpoints for retrieving service information, submitting bookings, and checking service status
Responsive web design compatible with desktop and mobile browsing
Contact form submission functionality with validation and confirmation
Service status tracking system showing real-time updates to customers
Package.json configured with 'install:all' script to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Package.json configured with 'dev' script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
